meanings.sent1: I decided to splurge on a new video game for my birthday.
meanings.sent2: She likes to splurge on designer clothes when she gets her bonus.
meanings.sent3: My friend always splurges on snacks at the movies, even though they're so expensive!
meanings.sent4: After saving for months, she finally splurged on a luxurious vacation to the beach.
meanings.sent5: The bride-to-be decided to splurge on a beautiful wedding dress that she fell in love with.

meanings.definition: An act of spending money freely or extravagantly.
meanings.sent1: Her shopping spree was a real splurge that left her with a lot of new things.
meanings.sent2: The family's weekend getaway was a fun splurge that they all enjoyed.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's unexpected vet visit turned out to be quite a splurge!
meanings.sent4: The company's annual holiday party was a splurge with fancy decorations and catering.
meanings.sent5: The impromptu road trip with friends turned into a memorable splurge on snacks and souvenirs.
